author: luc
msg: removed the current point from count in multistep integrators
updated documentation since now Adams-Bashforth and Adams-Moulton

author: markt
msg: Fix DBCP-288. When passivating a DelegatingConnection, not all of the trace objects will be statements so check each one before casting and closing.
Based on a patch provided by Marc Kannegießer

author: markt
msg: Fix DBCP-291. Narrow sync so we don't call borrowObject() inside the sync. If pool is exhausted and N threads request objects the requests will time out at maxWait, 2*maxWait, 3*maxWait, ..., n*maxWait rather than all timing out at maxWait.

author: markt
msg: Add a test case for DBCP-291
